```
    /var/log/cron
    /var/log/maillog
    /var/log/messages
    /var/log/secure
    /var/log/spooler
    {
        compress
        daily
        delaycompress
        dateext
        missingok
        rotate 365
        sharedscripts
        postrotate
            /bin/kill -HUP `cat /var/run/syslogd.pid 2> /dev/null` 2> /dev/null || true
        endscript
    }
    ```
